articles.description: SEATTLE, Nov. 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Leafly Holdings, Inc. (“Leafly” or “the Company”), a leading online cannabis discovery marketplace and resource for cannabis consumers, today announced that Peter Lee has been appointed Chief Executive Officer. articles.title: Russia’s ‘shadow vessels’ using false flags to skirt sanctions, report says

articles.title: B.C.’s Coastal First Nations ready to push back against expected fed pipeline announcement
articles.description: Ahead of an expected announcement between Alberta and the federal government on a new pipeline to B.C.'s North Coast, First Nations in the area are prepared to protest the step.

articles.title: Calgary police seeking millions in additional funding amid shortfall
articles.description: Calgary police are asking city council for millions in additional funding, citing a $49.4 million gap in their budget caused by declining photo radar revenue and the pressures of a growing population. The largest portion of the shortfall—$28 million—is tied to the loss of photo radar revenue. Earlie

articles.description: All westbound lanes of the Gardiner Expressway are closed at Yonge Street due to a two-vehicle collision. The collision occurred after 8 p.m. near Lower Jarvis Street. articles.title: Royal Canadian Legion $1M donation to support PTSD research at University of Alberta
articles.description: More than $1 million from the Royal Canadian Legion's poppy fund will go to the Heroes in Mind Advocacy and Research Consortium (HiMARC) at the University of Alberta.

articles.title: Guilbeault won’t resign from Cabinet over pipeline deal, government source says
articles.description: A pending framework agreement between Ottawa and Alberta to build an oil pipeline will not prompt Steven Guilbeault, a former Greenpeace activist, to quit Mark Carney's cabinet.

articles.title: Systemic failings in health care system led quadriplegic man to choose MAID: coroner
articles.description: A quadriplegic had such severe bed sores due to health system failures that he was forced to choose MAID to end his suffering, coroner says.

articles.title: Calgary braces for more snow after record-breaking storm on Monday
articles.description: Calgarians should prepare for the city’s second significant wave of snow this season, set to begin Thursday afternoon.
